title: Pogačar Confirms COVID Infection, Roglič ‘Feeling No Pain,’ and Evenepoel Won’t Throw in GC Towel
content:
Tour de France favorite Tadej Pogačar says he's fully recovered from COVID, Evenepoel won't throw in GC towel, Roglič feeling 'no pain.'

Read the full article at Pogačar Confirms COVID Infection, Roglič ‘Feeling No Pain,’ and Evenepoel Won’t Throw in GC Towel on Velo.
author: ahood
